english.segment1: It has been way too long since back when. Jasmine Ive been wrong. Ive been wrong about nothing
english.segment2: Youre still the same, I wish you changed. Its still your game by your rules. And I will never learn nothing. And nothing ever changes
english.segment3: Youre asking me to go to an ordinary, satisfactory. Almost paradise
english.segment4: Staying round you. Hanging round you Jasmine. With the sound of our straws. Sipping down Yoohoo
english.segment5: You tantalize, I fantasize. And in your eyes is the world. When all else fades into nothing. Im the proof youre beautiful. When youre aloof I get dumb. And I cant think about nothing else. And nothing ever changes
english.segment6: Youre asking me to go to an ordinary, satisfactory. Almost paradise
english.segment7: Staying round you. Hanging round you Jasmine. With the sound of our straws. Sipping down Yoohoo
english.segment8: Loves a beehive of honey and stings. And I dont care if I never learn nothing
english.segment9: Staying round you. Hanging round you Jasmine. With the sound of our straws. Sipping down Yoohoo
english.segment10: And I dont want anyone else. To mesmerize me, Jasmine
